original_text: After the soldiers had put Jesus on the cross, they took his clothes. They made them into four parts, one part for each soldier. They also took his long shirt, which was one single piece of cloth.
korean_text: 군인들이 예수를 십자가에 못 박고 그의 옷을 취하여 네 깃에 나눠 각각 한 깃씩 얻고 속옷도 취하니 이 속옷은 호지 아니하고 위에서부터 통으로 짠 것이라

sentences.original_text: After the soldiers had put Jesus on the cross
sentences.korean_translation: 군인들이 예수님을 십자가에 못 박은 후에

sentences.original_text: They made them into four parts
They also took his long shirt
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 그의 긴 셔츠도 가져갔다

sentences.original_text: which was one single piece of cloth
